title: Convert a Quote to a Sales Order
description: A customer has accepted a quote and wants to proceed with the order.

tasks.description: Find the existing quote using the quote number provided by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the active quote in the system.

tasks.description: Use the 'Convert to Order' function to automatically create a sales order from the quote details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully converts the quote into a new sales order.

tasks.description: Confirm the new sales order number with the customer and send them an order acknowledgement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the SO number to the customer and emails the acknowledgement.
